cause.description:
Please sign the petition against the cruelty of the dolphin slaughter in Japan, it only takes one minute, against a truely terrible practice. If you have the courage watch the video, but it really is horrible, as this is real footage of what is taking place in Japan. What ever you do please sign the petition, and forward. Thank you.
Porfa! Aunque sea de una firma en una firma, quien quita y podamos hacer la diferencia. Véanlo y por favor reenvíenlo.
Y FIRMEN si están de acuerdo en parar ESTO YA!
VIDEO: " http://www.glumbert.com/media/dolphin"
PETICION AL 1ER MINISTRO JAPONES: " http://www.petitiononline.com/golfinho/ ".
1. Stop the slaughter of the dolphins in Japan
cause.mission: Stop the slaughter of dolphins in Japan
cause.name: Dolphin slaughter in Japan
